sentences.en: At 12 weeks the fundus becomes palpable at the symphysis pubis.
sentences.cn: 12周时可在耻骨联合上触及宫底.

sentences.en: Company would be a palpable improvement, he thought.
sentences.cn: 他想,要是有个同伴,多少要好受些.

sentences.en: Company would be a palpable improvemtent, he thought.
sentences.cn: 他暗自想着,要是有个伴, 那就显然是强得多了.

sentences.en: Flattery in its most palpable form had lost its force with her.
sentences.cn: 露骨的奉承对她已经失去了作用.

sentences.en: Lymph nodes are enlarged and easily palpable.
My own feeling of surprise at being there was palpable.
sentences.cn: 我对自己能出席这个场合感到意外,这是可想而知的.

sentences.en: None of the vessels and nerves of the hand is visible or palpable.
sentences.cn: 手的血管和神经不能看到或摸到.

sentences.en: Technical progress can cease and the most palpable facts can be denied or disregarded.
sentences.cn: 技术进步可以停止,最明显的事实可以否认或不顾.

sentences.en: The city is now relatively quiet but there's palpable anger as people cope with shortages.
sentences.cn: 现在这座城市比较安静，但却因物资匮乏而明显充斥着怒气。

sentences.en: The spleen tip was palpable at the left costal margin.
sentences.cn: 脾尖可以在左肋缘处触知.

sentences.en: The tension between Amy and Jim is palpable.
sentences.cn: 埃米和吉姆之间明显关系紧张。

sentences.en: There is a palpable difference in their ages.
sentences.cn: 他们的年龄有着明显的差别.

sentences.en: There is an almost palpable feeling of hopelessness.
sentences.cn: 几乎明显有种无望的感觉。

sentences.en: There was a palpable sense of relief among the crowd.
sentences.cn: 众人显然都感到如释重负。

sentences.en: We see what we explore, our minds ascend a palpable ladder of causes and effects.
sentences.cn: 我们看得见我们勘探的事物, 我们的思想沿着层次分明的原因和结果逐步往上探索.

words.tran_cn: 明显的；[医]可感知的；易觉察的

trans.tran_cn: 明白的，明显的，可感知的，摸得出的
trans.tran_en: a feeling that is palpable is so strong that other people notice it and can feel it around them
